start: ^Ah, you’re here just in time! I’m nearly out of quality iron, and my work depends on it.
^Could you fetch a shipment of iron ore from Tiberius the Miner?
goal_0: ^Good! I have the iron ore ready, but these crates are heavy. You’ll need to carry them carefully don’t go dropping them now!
goal_1: ^With this, I can keep the forge blazing.
